sn17.21:1: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, dreadful are gain, honour, and praise … .sn.ii.235Bhikkhus, even though a woman, when one is alone with her, may not persist obsessing one's mind, still gain, honour, and praise might persist obsessing one's mind. So dreadful, bhikkhus, are gain, honour, and praise … . Thus should you train yourselves."
